mapper.insert: insert into client(userid, password, email, address) values(#{userid}, #{password}, #{email}, #{address})
mapper.select: select count(*) from client where userid = #{userid}
select userid from client where userid = #{userid} and password = #{password}
select password from client where userid=#{userid}
mapper.update: update client set password = #{password}, email = #{email}, address = #{address} where userid = #{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from client where userid = #{userid} and password = #{password}
